classes.name: Fighter
classes.description: A master of martial combat, skilled with a variety of weapons and armor.

classes.name: Rogue
classes.description: A master of stealth and deception, skilled in the art of surprise attacks.

classes.name: Wizard
classes.description: A scholarly magic-user capable of manipulating the structures of reality.

classes.name: Cleric
classes.description: A priestly champion who wields divine magic in service of a higher power.

classes.name: Ranger
classes.description: A warrior who uses martial prowess and nature magic to combat threats on the edges of civilization.

classes.name: Paladin
classes.description: A holy warrior bound to a sacred oath.

classes.name: Bard
classes.description: An inspiring magician whose power echoes the music of creation.

classes.name: Druid
classes.description: A priest of the Old Faith, wielding the powers of nature and adopting animal forms.

classes.name: Monk
classes.description: A master of martial arts, harnessing the power of the body in pursuit of physical and spiritual perfection.

classes.name: Warlock
classes.description: A wielder of magic that is derived from a bargain with an extraplanar entity.

classes.name: Sorcerer
classes.description: A spellcaster who draws on inherent magic from a gift or bloodline.

classes.name: Barbarian
classes.description: A fierce warrior of primitive background who can enter a battle rage.

classes.name: Artificer
classes.description: A master of invention, combining magic and technology to create wondrous devices.

races.name: Human
races.description: Versatile and ambitious, humans are the most adaptable and diverse

races.name: Elf
races.description: Graceful and wise, elves are known for their longevity and keen senses.

races.name: Dwarf
races.description: Stout and resilient, dwarves are known for their craftsmanship and strong sense of tradition.

races.name: Halfling
races.description: Cheerful and nimble, halflings are known for their luck and resourcefulness.

races.name: HalfOrc
races.description: Half-orcs are strong and resilient, with a mix of human and orcish traits.

races.name: Gnome
races.description: Curious and inventive, gnomes are known for their intellect and affinity for magic.

races.name: Tiefling
races.description: Mysterious and charismatic, tieflings have infernal heritage that grants them unique abilities.

races.name: Dragonborn
races.description: Proud and honorable, dragonborn are known for their draconic ancestry and breath weapon.

races.name: HalfElf
races.description: Versatile and charismatic, half-elves combine the best traits of humans and elves.

characters.name: Aragorn
characters.backstory: Aragorn is the heir of Isildur, raised in the wilds of Middle-earth.

characters.name: Gandalf
characters.backstory: Gandalf is a wise and powerful wizard, guiding the Fellowship of the Ring.

characters.name: Legolas
characters.backstory: Legolas is a skilled archer and member of the Fellowship, hailing from the Woodland Realm.
